page.title: 10Gt.Waldingfield Farming 2
page.content: On his farm,Mr. Kiddy is dependent upon sprays and machinery.He owns a Klaas Combine Harvester;two tractors;a Massey Drill;A Beet Harvester;a 3 furrow plough;a harrow;a hay turner and a pick-up trailer. Mr.Kiddy has removed some hedges to create larger fields and incorporated former grazing land with fields to make larger fields which are more suitable for farming with machinery.This,and the death of so many Elms through Dutch Elm Disease has affected the landscape.Mr.Kiddy is aware of the need for conservation and is careful to keep charges within proportion.
